reviewText: I am thrilled! The movies came in perfect brand new condition
Cruel Intentions 2 is not in widescreen aspect as stated on the box. Instead it is 1:33 standard. The first and third discs are both wide though.
DVD came quick but thay were reserfest so much thay don't work
Good movies and all in 1 package.

As far as movies and sequels go, the first one is the best one. The second one is acceptable. The third one is questionable. I am not one for writing movie reviews as I feel it is a matter of opinion. For the little I paid for it, it's  a good buy. I really only wanted the first one but it was less expensive to get the triology.

The reused plot of wealthy but bored offspring plotting against peers should be expected.  By now a profit motivated producer would indulge prurient viewers, such as me, with a few actors for whom nudity was not a problem.  Certainly the leads could keep their muslin drapes of respectability drawn together, but not everyone.  Good God people, this writer can but barely fill the mouths of his characters with dialogue.  No witty repartee here and if that cannot be had then put something naked on the screen while I sit here drinking something cold.

This collection set is what it is.  You receive all 3 DVDs, spindles on top of each other.  Would be nice if they were packaged a little different but if I was that picky I would've bought all 3 dvd's separately.  The second movie is a prequel to the first, while the third has different characters.  I loved the first two and decided to finish out the trilogy.
I love all 3 of these movies and the actors in it! These are all very good movies. Thank you!
Pretty good Dangerous Liaison is better
One of my favorite movies! Nice to have all 3 of them even though I haven't watched the second two and I don't know that I ever will. :0)
It was PERFECT, just as described!!
Came a few days early great buy
Bought this because it was cheaper than buying Cruel Intentions on its own. The other two movies, not so good, but he first is a classic.
